item.title: Fire evacuation order lifted for LA's Hollywood Hills West
item.description: Officials say the blaze is now under control, but urge residents to be careful when returning to their homes.

item.title: 'Like a warzone': LA residents describe fleeing fire
item.description: People at an evacuation centre describe fleeing their homes as flames engulfed their streets.

item.title: Army chief elected Lebanon's president after years of deadlock
item.description: The crisis-plagued country's divided parliament ends a power vacuum that lasted more than two years.

item.title: Powerful photos reveal dramatic scenes as LA fires rage
item.description: The fires have been spreading rapidly because of high winds and very dry conditions.

item.title: Russia keeping close eye on Trump's claim to Greenland
item.description: The Kremlin reacts to the US president-elect's remarks saying the Arctic is in Russia's sphere of interest.
